title: How I Built This Website
content:
This is the story of how this website was created, from the initial design inspiration to the final code. It's a journey through modern web development with a focus on simplicity and performance.

### The Stack
* **HTML5** for structure
* **CSS3** for styling
* **JavaScript (ES6)** for interactivity

title: Productivity in 2025
content:
Productivity isn't about doing more; it's about doing what matters. In this article, we explore frameworks and mental models to help you focus on the important tasks.

> The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.

title: A Guide to User Empathy
content:
Building great products starts with understanding your users. This guide covers techniques for developing deep user empathy.
